content.question: In sentence 8, the writer wants to provide evidence to clarify the previous sentence’s point about what advocates fail to consider. Which of the following versions of “requires compliance with local building codes” in sentence 8 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: costs more than the home itself
is an inconvenient and time-consuming process
can be avoided if a friend is willing to share land

content.answer: costs more than the home itself

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
